mapper.select: select photo_id, titl, cdt, vw_cnt, lesson_id from lms_photo order by photo_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into lms_photo( titl, lesson_id) values( #{title}, #{no})
mapper.select: select photoBoard_id, titl, cdt, vw_cnt from lms_photoBoard where photoBoard_id = #{value}
